Rulings.Tengu:
●Primal Seed can add cards to your hand that were removed from play face-up (Dimensionhole) or face-down (Different Dimension Capsule).
●You target the 2 removed cards when you activate Primal Seed.
●If you don't have 2 or more cards removed from play, you cannot activate Primal Seed.
●A Fusion Monster or Synrho Monster selected with Primal Seed returns to the Extra Deck.
●The required card only needs to be face-up on the field. It does not need to be a Monster Card, so if “Black Luster Soldier – Envoy of the Beginning” is equipped to “Relinquished”, you can activate “Primal Seed”.

A Fusion Monster selected with Primal Seed returns to the Fusion Deck.
●The required card only needs to be face-up on the field. It does not need to be a Monster Card, so if “Black Luster Soldier – Envoy of the Beginning” is equipped to “Relinquished”, you can activate “Primal Seed”.

Rulings.Base:
1. "Primal Seed" can add cards to your hand that were removed from play face-up ("Dimensionhole") or face-down ("Different Dimension Capsule").
2. You target the 2 removed cards when you activate "Primal Seed".
3. If you don't have 2 or more cards removed from play, you cannot activate "Primal Seed".
4. A Fusion Monster or Synchro Monster selected with "Primal Seed" returns to the Extra Deck.
5. The required card only needs to be face-up on the field. It does not need to be a Monster Card, so if "Black Luster Soldier - Envoy of the Beginning" is equipped to "Relinquished", you can activate "Primal Seed".
